post:
Rather more mundane, David. Duxford aerodrome and its hangars are home to the last remaining WW2 US B17 bomber (‚ÄúMemphis Belle‚Äù) and loadsa other museum specimens being part of the Imperial War Museum.

The B17 really does generate that vast amount of smoke when each of its engines start up. I‚Äôve been there at a display with grandchildren and seen it with my own eyes!
If it‚Äôs accustomed to smoke, it can surely cope with equally vast amounts of hot air from hosting my 2018 International Shroud Conference. Sorry, no aliens (‚ÄúHangar 18‚Äù)  ‚Äì just other-worldly earthlings with their flights of fancy.
author: Colin Berry

title: Mr. Barrie Schwortz, President of STERA Inc: please stop proselytizing narrative-driven so-called¬†science.
post: Hi, Colin, I appeal to your open mind, not to any acquired attitude that may block the possibility, this particular Shroud may be the genuine one.  I know there may have been thousands of man-made images of Jesus, after all, thousands of people had first hand healing.  They likely shared wha He looked like.  Even if He were ebony black, I would accept Him, would you, if He were truly God, in the flesh.  And some, healed,  were not even near Him, but had intercessionary representatives.  All women, especially, should love Jesus, as He, alone, was always good to them, and the children.  Whatever this Shroud is, it does represent a man of sorrows, whose only crime was he loved sinners as they were, not demanding perfection in them, then, in order  to receive favor and grace, and to you, too.  A challenge:  Ask Him for truth, or anything else of you personally need.  I have seen such a granting of those who are a Doubting Thomas, to start with.  They do get an answer and confirmation, as long as your request is not silly.  Such would be to jump off a bridge and expect no body injury.
author: Donna Young

title: Mr. Barrie Schwortz, President of STERA Inc: please stop proselytizing narrative-driven so-called¬†science.
post:
Hello there.
You‚Äôve come to the wrong site, I‚Äôm afraid,  given your uncompromising pro-authenticity stance ‚Äì not that I hold that against you. It‚Äôs simply that this particular researcher regards any blood ‚Äì if genuine ‚Äì as 14th and later, not 1st century.
Have you read Kelly Kearse on Shroud DNA? Here‚Äôs a link to one of his pdfs. 
https://www.shroud.com/pdfs/kearse3.pdf
See Pages 8-13 especially  ‚Äì i.e. the final section dealing with limitations of DNA analysis in situations where you don‚Äôt know the precise origin of the biological material that‚Äôs being sampled or its level of intactness after centuries of degradation.
author: Colin Berry

title: Mr. Barrie Schwortz, President of STERA Inc: please stop proselytizing narrative-driven so-called¬†science.
post:
I would appreciate a link or update on the chromosome count of any blood linked to the crucifixion of  the man, I call ‚Äòthe man  of sorrows‚Äô, whom I indentify with being the image on the Shroud of Turin.
I would like to know if the blood can be the same of the blood on the face cloth (sudarium) and the alleged blood scrapings taken off the cave walls beneath the crucifixion location.  This cave is alleged to hold hidden, since or before 580 AD,  the Ark of the Covenant.  This is a finding alleged by Ron Wyatt before he died in 1999.
What I would like to know, in my lifetime, if possible, if the chromosomes are supernatural 23, when normal for humans is 46.
 I would like to know the sex identifier, too, is it  (XY),  (XX)  or just (Y).
And,  is the human blood (AB) or is it (AB Positive)?
If some of these could be confirmed by reliable blood chemist experts it maybe could lead to some clarification of the Trinity.
Is Jesus an all male Clone God, like Dolly the Sheep?  Dolly was allegeged an all female cloned sheep, or was that a scam?  What were Dolly‚Äôs chromosome count and sex identifiers?
 Is Jesus a result of a normal God family, God the Father, God the Female Holy Spirit and resulting in God the Holy and only Begotton Son, Jesus, Lord and Savior of Earth and all mankind?
And the angels sing, Holy, Holy, Holy.
author: dyoung2012
